Feature request or bug report

Have a feature suggestion for our software or are you experiencing an issue ? Fill out the form below, and we will look into it.

What Internet browser are you using to use OmniGeometry ? We officially support Chrome, Firefox & Brave, so please test with those if seeing a bug.
The operating system you are running OmniGeometry on.
Please try to be as detailed as possible. If reporting an bug, describe how you can replicate it. For feature requests, describe how and why you would use this feature. Thank you!
